verses.verse: O ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> gather yourselves to <S%H5756>flee<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%> and set <S%H5375>up<s%> a sign of <S%H4864>fire<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H1021>Beth-haccerem:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8259>appeareth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
I have <S%H1819>likened<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to a <S%H5000>comely<s%> and <S%H6026>delicate<s%> woman.

The <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> with their <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her; they shall <S%H8628>pitch<s%> their <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her round <S%H5439>about;<s%> they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> his <S%H3027>place.<s%>

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> ye <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her; <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto us! <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> goeth <S%H6437>away,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> are stretched <S%H5186>out.<s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> her <S%H759>palaces.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Hew ye <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H6097>trees,<s%> and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H6485>visited;<s%> she is <S%H3605>wholly<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her.

As a <S%H953>fountain<s%> casteth <S%H6979>out<s%> her <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> she <S%H6979>casteth<s%> out her <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> in her; <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H8548>continually<s%> is <S%H2483>grief<s%> and <S%H4347>wounds.<s%>

Be thou <S%H3256>instructed,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3363>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee; <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H7760>make<s%> thee <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> They shall throughly <S%H5953>glean<s%> <S%H5953><s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as a <S%H1612>vine:<s%> turn <S%H7725>back<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> as a grape <S%H1219>gatherer<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H5552>baskets.<s%>

To <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and give <S%H5749>warning,<s%> that they may <S%H8085>hear?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> is <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and they <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7181>hearken:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> unto them a <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in it.

Therefore I am <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H3557>holding<s%> in: I will pour it <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5768>children<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken,<s%> the <S%H2205>aged<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him that is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> unto <S%H312>others,<s%> with their <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from the <S%H4480>least<s%> <S%H6996><s%> of them even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> of them every <S%H3605>one<s%> is given <S%H1214>to<s%> <S%H1215>covetousness;<s%> and from the <S%H4480>prophet<s%> <S%H5030><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H6213>dealeth<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

They have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the daughter of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5921>slightly,<s%> <S%H7043><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> when there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Were they <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> <S%H1571>nay,<s%> they were <S%H3808>not<s%> at all <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H954><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3045>could<s%> they <S%H3637>blush:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> among them that <S%H5307>fall:<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> them they shall be cast <S%H3782>down,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5975>Stand<s%> ye <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H7592>ask<s%> for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5410>paths,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> therein, and ye shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4771>rest<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%> But they <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> therein.

Also I <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, saying, <S%H7181>Hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%> But they <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7181>hearken.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> ye <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H3045>know,<s%> O <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> is among them.

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> nor to my <S%H8451>law,<s%> but <S%H3988>rejected<s%> it.

To <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2088>purpose<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> there to me <S%H3828>incense<s%> from <S%H4480>Sheba,<s%> <S%H7614><s%> and the <S%H2896>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H4480>country?<s%> <S%H776><s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7522>acceptable,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> <S%H6149>sweet<s%> unto me.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4383>stumblingblocks<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> upon them; the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> and his <S%H7453>friend<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>country,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall be <S%H5782>raised<s%> from the <S%H4480>sides<s%> <S%H3411><s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They shall lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H3591>spear;<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> are <S%H394>cruel,<s%> and have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7355>mercy;<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H1993>roareth<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and they <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> set in <S%H6186>array<s%> as <S%H376>men<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8089>fame<s%> thereof: our <S%H3027>hands<s%> wax <S%H7503>feeble:<s%> <S%H6869>anguish<s%> hath taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> of us, and <S%H2427>pain,<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>

Go not <S%H408>forth<s%> <S%H3318><s%> into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H4032>fear<s%> is on every <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2296>gird<s%> thee with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and wallow <S%H6428>thyself<s%> in <S%H665>ashes:<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H60>mourning,<s%> as for an only <S%H3173>son,<s%> most <S%H8563>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> shall <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us.

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee for a <S%H969>tower<s%> and a <S%H4013>fortress<s%> among my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1870>way.<s%>

They are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5493>grievous<s%> <S%H5637>revolters,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> with <S%H7400>slanders:<s%> they are <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron;<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7843>corrupters.<s%>

The <S%H4647>bellows<s%> are <S%H2787>burned,<s%> the <S%H5777>lead<s%> is <S%H8552>consumed<s%> of the <S%H4480>fire;<s%> <S%H784><s%> the <S%H6884>founder<s%> <S%H6884>melteth<s%> in <S%H7723>vain:<s%> for the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> plucked <S%H5423>away.<s%>
Reprobate <S%H3988><s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall men <S%H7121>call<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3988>rejected<s%> them.
